entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 a.m. MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:01 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
